scripts.last-blocks: sqlite3 sepolia.sqlite -readonly -header 'SELECT number FROM blocks ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 20'
scripts.last-contracts: sqlite3 sepolia.sqlite -readonly -header 'SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 20'
scripts.frequent-contracts: sqlite3 -readonly -header sepolia.sqlite 'SELECT hash AS "Contract Hash", address AS "Witness Address", COUNT(address) AS "#Address", size FROM contracts GROUP BY hash ORDER BY COUNT(address) DESC LIMIT 20'
scripts.contract-addresses: sqlite3 -readonly -csv sepolia.sqlite 'SELECT address, hash FROM contracts' | split -d -l 200000 - .data/sepolia-contract-addresses.csv
